Package geometries

Class FlatGeometry

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.FlatGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Plane, Polygon
public abstract class FlatGeometry extends Geometry
Flat Geometry is a Marker abstract class extending Geometry to differentiate it from RadialGeometry we did not declare it as an interface
